quotes.quote: When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You can observe a lot by just watching.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It ain’t over till it’s over.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It’s like déjà vu all over again.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: No one goes there nowadays, it’s too crowded.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Baseball is 90% mental and the other half is physical.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: A nickel ain’t worth a dime anymore.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Always go to other people’s funerals, otherwise they won’t come to yours.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: We made too many wrong mistakes.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Congratulations. I knew the record would stand until it was broken.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I’m not hungry enough to eat six
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You wouldn’t have won if we’d beaten you.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I usually take a two-hour nap from one to four.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Slump? I ain’t in no slump… I just ain’t hitting.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra
